title: University of Cambridge Equality and Diversity Speaker: Christine Burns
description: Christine Burns MBE has campaigned for the civil rights of transgender people for 25 years. She is the editor of ‘Trans Britain: Our Journey from the Shadows’, a comprehensive account of the landmark events which shaped the transgender community over the last five decades.

json_ld.name: University of Cambridge Equality and Diversity Speaker: Christine Burns
json_ld.description: <p>Christine Burns MBE has campaigned for the civil rights of transgender people for 25 years. She is the editor of \'Trans Britain: Our Journey from the Shadows\', a comprehensive account of the landmark events which shaped the transgender community over the last five decades.</p>\n
